#summary Naming convention in code

= Introduction =
QERP is developed using Java as core programming language, with javascript and CSS as assisting programming language at Web UI.

We need a naming convention to help to easily understand the code and to form a standardization of code.

Please refer to the respective programming language for naming convention if this guide does not cover it

= Details =

Add your content here.  Format your content with:
  * Text in *bold* or _italic_
  * Headings, paragraphs, and lists
  * Automatic links to other wiki pages
